article_title: Late changes may doom Florida proposal to protect patients from surprise medical bills
article_text:
01:19

'Narrow window of opportunity' to keep Zika from spreading, says CDC

article_metadata.news-keywords: balance billing, surprise medical bills, hospitals, doctors, physician groups, Florida, healthcare, debt, medical debt, hospital bills, patients, consumers, Carlos Trujillo, Rene Garcia
article_metadata.description: A proposal led by Miami-Dade lawmakers to protect patients from receiving unexpected medical bills for out-of-network care — a goal that doctors, hospitals and health insurers all say they support — is in trouble in the Florida Legislature this week after a last-minute change that consumer advocates worry is undermining support for the legislation.
article_metadata.title: Late changes may doom Florida proposal to protect patients from surprise medical bills | Miami Herald

og.description: A proposal led by Miami-Dade lawmakers to protect patients from receiving unexpected medical bills for out-of-network care — a goal that doctors, hospitals and health insurers all say they support — is in trouble in the Florida Legislature this week after a last-minute change that consumer advocates worry is undermining support for the legislation.
